thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent customer service and clean room
thread.title_full: Excellent customer service and clean room - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Andy L
title: Excellent customer service and clean room
text: Customer service is excellent and great food recommendation by the front desk. Room is small ( could be a norm in Rome ) but very clean. Love the vending machines and self help laundry room. Great breakfast but same food everyday.
